description: This file is a BitBake include recipe for building Xen hypervisor tools and utilities, defining dependencies, packaging, configuration, installation steps, and system integration scripts.

classes.name: XenToolsRecipe
classes.description: A class representing the compilation, installation, and deployment process for Xen tools in bitbake.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Configure the build environment for Xen tools by calling common configuration routines.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Compile the Xen tools, invoking 'make' with appropriate variables.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Install Xen tools into the destination directory, clean up unnecessary files, set up volatile directories, and configure systemd or init.d scripts.

methods.name: pkg_postinst:${PN}-volatiles
methods.description: Post-installation routine to set up volatile directories using systemd or init.d scripts.

methods.name: do_deploy
methods.description: Deploy Xen policy files and related artifacts into the deployment directory for packaging or image creation.
